name: Crazy Moto Racer - Bike Race Street Escape
name_original: Crazy Moto Racer - Bike Race Street Escape
description:
Are you ready for some "Real Racing"

Are you ready to dominate the city?

Well here's your chance!
Introducing, Crazy Bike Moto Racer

Warning! Be careful, this application may entertain you for more hours than you think! Don't forget to take a break at least every 40 minutes!

Race for dominance and reach finish line first place!
Choose the ride you want, and race thru the city streets!

Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and drift, drag, roll, and keep beat them down.
The most crazy, addictive & FUN physics based racing game ever made.

Fast Features:
- Different bikes to choose from
- Realistic physics-based gameplay
- Smooth controls
- High Definition graphics
- Amazing sound and music
- Bonus and reward everyday!

So what are you waiting for?
Take on the challenge and roam the city!

Download Street Crazy Bike Moto Racer while its free!
